description:
Aug 8-10: City Hall/Bow Valley College to Marlborough closure

The Blue Line will be closed between City Hall/Bow Valley College and Marlborough stations starting at 8 p.m. on Friday, August 8 until the very early hours of Monday, August 11.

Trains coming from the west and downtown will terminate at City Hall/Bow Valley College Station. And trains from the northeast will terminate at Marlborough. For all those stations in between, we'll have three shuttle bus routes replacing train service.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
